metadata.name: 5'HA-hAAVS1
metadata.description: Homology arm for targeting of hAVVS1 locus

metadata.name: 5'-ITR-PB
metadata.description: transposon-specific inverted terminal repeat sequences (ITRs) recognized by PiggyBac transposase

metadata.name: Insulator_FB
metadata.description: FII/BEAD-A (FB) element. (STEMCELLS2008;26:3257–3266 ). FII/BEAD-A (FB) contains the minimal enhancer-blocking components of the chicken b-globin 5'HS4 insulator and a homologous region from the human T-cell receptor  BEAD-1 insulator

metadata.name: CAGp
metadata.description: strong synthetic promoter used to drive high levels of gene expression in mammalian expression vectors. constructed in the lab of Dr Jun-ichi Miyazaki [3][4] from the following sequences: (C) the cytomegalovirus (CMV) early enhancer element + (A) the promoter, the first exon and the first intron of chicken beta-actin gene + (G) the splice acceptor of the rabbit beta-globin gene.

metadata.name: CMVp_Tet
metadata.description: Tetracycline repressible CMV promoter. CMV promoter with downstream operator sequences for TetRepressor.

metadata.name: EF1ap
metadata.description: strong constitutive promoter derived from  endogenous promoter of human elongation factor EF-1α . EF-1 alpha is often useful in conditions where other promoters (such as CMV) have diminished activity or have been silenced (as in embryonic stem cells)

metadata.name: TRE3Gp
metadata.description: 3rd-generation Tet-responsive promoter that can be activated by binding of Tet-On® 3G

metadata.name: Kt-L7Ae - Weiss
metadata.description: L7Ae:K-turn system. K-t = K-turn, recognition sequence for RNA-binding protein L7Ae  . L7Ae then binds the K-turn motifs in the 5′ UTR of RNA and block the ribosome binding to the mRNA.    doi:10.1038/nbt.3301

metadata.name: attB - BxB1
metadata.description: attB site for BxB1 integrase.

metadata.name: attP - BxB1
metadata.description: attP site for BxB1 integrase

metadata.name: K1-K1 -L7Ae
metadata.description: L7Ae:K-turn system. K = K-turn, recognition sequence for RNA-binding protein L7Ae  . L7Ae then binds the K-turn motifs in the 5′ UTR of RNA and block the ribosome binding to the mRNA.

metadata.name: Kt-Kt -L7Ae-Weiss
metadata.description: L7Ae:K-turn system. K-t = K-turn, recognition sequence for RNA-binding protein L7Ae  . L7Ae then binds the K-turn motifs in the 5′ UTR of RNA and block the ribosome binding to the mRNA.    doi:10.1038/nbt.3301

metadata.name: ATG-BoxC (L7Ae)
metadata.description: BoxC recognized by RNA binding protein L7Ae.  L7Ae then binds theBoxC motif placed after the ATG and block translation of the CDS. dOI: 10.1038/nCHeMBIO.273

metadata.name: Kozak_ATG
metadata.description: Classical kozak sequence

metadata.name: Nt-IgKL sequence
metadata.description: N-terminal leader sequence from mouse immunoglobulin κ light chain. Peptide tag that targets the protein to the secretion pathway for protein secretion

metadata.name: Nt-MLS
metadata.description: N-Terminal mitochondrial leader sequence. Peptide tag that targets the protein to the mitochondria

metadata.name: Nt-myristoylation signal
metadata.description: N-Terminal myristoylation signal. N-myristoylation signal from Src Kinase - fusion proteins are targeted to and serve as markers of the plasma membrane. Anchors protein to the membrane ( Genesis. 2006 April ; 44(4): 202–218. doi:10.1002/dvg.20203.)

metadata.name: Nt-Palmytolination sequence
metadata.description: N-terminal GAP43-palmitoylation sequence. Petide tag for targeting the protein to the plasma membrane

metadata.name: Nt-SV40-NLS
metadata.description: N-terminal nuclear localization signal of SV40 large T antigen. Peptide tag for targeting the protein to the nucleus

metadata.name: BxB1
metadata.description: BxB1 Serine integrase. Phage-encoded serine integrases (Xu et al. BMC Biotechnology 2013, 13:87)

metadata.name: L7Ae - Weiss
metadata.description: ribosomal protein L7Ae of Archaeoglobus fulgidus, which binds tightly to the K-turn RNA motif.  It can be used to inhibit tranlsation when Kt is placed in 5'UTR of a mRNA. doi:10.1038/nbt.3301

metadata.name: L7Ae
metadata.description: ribosomal protein L7Ae of Archaeoglobus fulgidus, which binds tightly to the K-turn RNA motif.  It can be used to inhibit tranlsation when Kt is placed in 5'UTR of a mRNA. doi:10.1038/nbt.3301

metadata.name: mKate2
metadata.description: Fluorescent reporter - Far red - λex (nm) = 588, λem (nm) = 633 doi: 10.1042/bj20081949

metadata.name: mNeoGreen
metadata.description: Fluorescent reporter - Green - λex (nm) = 506 λem (nm) = 517  . doi: 10.1038/nmeth.2413

metadata.name: mRuby2
metadata.description: Fluorescent reporter - Red - λex (nm) = 559 λem (nm) = 600  . doi: 10.1038/nmeth.2171

metadata.name: mTagBFP2
metadata.description: Fluorescent reporter - Blue - λex (nm) = 399 λem (nm) = 454  . doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0028674

metadata.name: Linker 1
metadata.description: Flexible peptide linker: SGLRSGSGGGSASGGSG  . PROTEIN SCIENCE 2013 VOL 22:153—167

metadata.name: Linker 2
metadata.description: The linker sequence avoid large hydrophobic residues to maintain good solubility in aque- ous solutions. This linker provided similar performance as a longer (GGGGS)4 linker. One advantage of this linker over the (GGGGS)4 linker is that it did not have high homologous repeats in its DNA coding sequence.   Nat. Biotechnol. 17 (1999) 691–695.

metadata.name: p2A-Porcine teschovirus-1
metadata.description: ‘self-cleaving’ 2A peptide. Nat. Biotechnol. (2004) 22, 589–594

metadata.name: Ct-KDEL
metadata.description: Protein tag for targeting the endoplasmic reticulum

metadata.name: IRES2
metadata.description: IRES - internal ribosome entry site. ATG in included

metadata.name: BSDR
metadata.description: blasticidin-resistance gene encoding a  blasticidin S (BS) deaminase. Blasticidin is an efficient selective antibiotic that acts on both eukaryotic and prokaryotic cells

metadata.name: PuroR
metadata.description: Puromycin resistance gene ecnoding a puromycin N-acetyl-transferase. Puromycin is an antibiotic that is a protein synthesis inhibitor by inhibiting translation

metadata.name: NeoR
metadata.description: Neomycin resistance gene encoding a neomycin phosphotransferase. G418, also known as G418 sulfate and Geneticin, is an aminoglycoside antibiotic similar in structure to gentamicin B1, produced by Micromonospora rhodorangea. G418 blocks polypeptide synthesis by inhibiting the elongation step in both prokaryotic and eukaryotic cells. Resistance to G418 is conferred by the Neomycin resistance gene

metadata.name: DmrC
metadata.description: DmrC is a chemically inducible  dimerization domain.It dimerizes with DmrA in presence of heterodimerizer.  iDimerizeTM Inducible Heterodimer System - Clontech

metadata.name: Fyrefly Luciferase
metadata.description: Reporter gene encoding for Fyreply luciferase. Bioluminescent imaging  is a sensitive and versatile tool that uses luciferase enzyme as an imaging reporter

metadata.description: Fluorescent reporter - Green - λex (nm) = 506 λem (nm) = 517  . doi: 10.1038/nmeth.2413

metadata.name: a-Tubulin
metadata.description: Gene encoding for alpha-Tubulin

metadata.name: Tet-Aptazyme
metadata.description: Tetracycline-inducible  aptazyme. It is a ribozyme that once placed in the 3'UTR causes RNA self-cleavage. The mRNA loses the polyA and is degraded. The result is a posttranscriptional downregulation of gene expression.  The ribozyme is fused with an aptamer that recognizes tetracycline. In presence of Tet the aptazyme is inactivated and the mRNA is not degraded.  dx.doi.org/10.1021/sb500270h | ACS Synth. Biol. 2015, 4, 526−534
